sample_docs: Axis 2420 Network Video Camera New from AXIS is the 2420 Network Camera. It's main advantage is the fact that the camera is dual computable i.e. it generates both a standard Composite Video Signal (like a normal CCTV camera) in addition to a Network Digital Signal allowing local connection to a computer network or Internet. The camera also has built-in motion detection in addition to an auto-iris lens drive (optional) allowing it to work in very low light applications.

Axis 2401 Video Server Delivering extremely high quality Motion-JPEG images with a frame rate of up to 30 frames/second, the Axis 2401 presents a breakthrough in CCTV and video surveillance systems. A single box solution for video transmission over any network including local and wide area networks and even over the Internet. Simply connect any video source to the box, attach the video server to a network, assign it a network address and your there. The only viewing software needed is the freely available Netscape Navigator or Microsoft Internet Explorer. Axis' true Web based administration tools allow the user to quickly tailor-design their application; quad image, guard tour, pre-post alarm storage and Pan/Tilt/Zoom control are but a few of the built-in features. We sell a range of proven related products, which share the same protocols. By connecting these products you can enjoy full control of Pan/Tilt/Zoom functions directly from the desktop. Looping Video Inputs Four Alarm Inputs/One Output Up to 30 frames/second frame rate Video Stream - 25 frames/second Milestone Surveillance PRO -Turns the Axis 2400's into a sophisticated digital video surveillance system. JVC TKC421 Camera -CCTV Colour Camera Sony EVI D31 - Comprehensive Internal Pan/Tilt/Zoom Camera Pelco Spectra II - External CCTV Dome with Pan/Tilt/Zoom

Eliminate the need for multiple passwords with BioShield which comes bundled with all our Identix fingerprint scanner systems. PicoDisk Encrypted USB Flash Memory Disk 16Mb • A fully encrypted USB flash memory disk where files and folders remain encrypted even after their use. • Fast secure symmetric encryption algorithm (AES, 128 bit key length). • On the fly encryption: the user is unaware that the data is protected and can interact with files and folders as they would do normally. However each time the data is accessed it is automatically decrypted in the memory by the disk driver. • Automatic encryption of the data on transfer to the USB flash memory disk token. • Crypto PIN protection: whenever the user plugs or unplugs the flash memory drive, he will be prompted to enter the PIN to unlock the USB token to proceed with encrypt/decrypt operations while reading and writing files. • PUK security feature: the system comes with a PUK number, a secret code to keep aside for future reference in case the PIN needs changing or has been forgotten. • Easily portable: slip it in a pocket or attach it to a key ring. • No cables, no power supply. • Compact size and light weight. • Desktop Personal Computer / Notebook / Laptop with USB port (Pentium 100Mhz 0r better). • Windows 98, SE, ME, 2000, XP. • Picodisk Software Driver. • USB Spec 1.1. • 1 LED: LED on USB hard disk drive connected and enumerated. LED blinking, data transmitting or receiving. • Data Transfer Rate: Read (800 kbyte/sec), Write (400 kbyte/sec). • Dimensions 60x17x7 mm. • Weight 12g. • Regulatory compliance FCC class B, CE. • USB bus powered (4.5V to 5.5V). • Encryption algorithm: AES (performance: ~16 Mbytes/sec on Intel Pentium II 400MHz machines).

ThumbDrive Touch - Fingerprint Secure USB Drive As more people rely on computers and the Internet to create and store information, personal security and privacy becomes ever more important. ThumbDrive TOUCH combines fingerprint biometric technologies to offer a single portable sec ure storage medium, offering protection against intrusion. Personal Your personal data should be accessible by you only. With ThumbDrive TOUCH Fingerprint USB Drive, it is now pos sible! Users who have difficulty remembering their passwords can now let their fingers do the remembering. Biometrics The ThumbDrive TOUCH USB Drive brings biometric security to the ThumbDrive family. It includes a fingerprint reader sensor that performs enrolment and verification of the user. Each time the user plugs in the ThumbDrive, a simple but accurate authentication process takes place - by placing the user's finger on the sensor. Once the user is positively identified, the data that is stored on the ThumbDrive becomes accessible.
